t: Good product but watch out for shill reviews on Amazon
s: What really struck me is all of the 5 star reviews (every one of them) where none of the reviewers show an actual amazon purchase of this product. Dig deeper and you find that 99% of those reviewers have only reviewed this product or maybe one other item. Smells like shill reviews to me.
